text: Hi! If my page is in chinese, I need my blog posts to display in their chinese versions. how would this be possible?

For a new new brand, the domain is ready, however the main brand website on WordPress is still not build and is not live yet. 

Could we still connect the domain with HubSpot and start building landing page and blogs and publish them ?

This can be a tricky situation. I would say if you can, avoid editing the same page at the same time. Divide the work so that only one dev works on a page. If you need to be able to have multiple devs you may need to look into a local workflow with the HubSpot CLI and Github deployment to track changes and deploy updates.
Yes if you set them up with sub domains

This oauth-token () does not have proper permissions! (requires any of [file-manager-access])
